sentences.english: The eagle that soars in the upper air does not worry itself as to how it is to cross rivers. --Selected.
sentences.chinese: 高飛天空的鷲鷹，從不掛慮它將怎樣渡過江河。

sentences.english: Turkey vultures ranging over the rain forests of South America can't see their food either.
sentences.chinese: 盤旋於南美雨林上空的美洲鷲也無法看見獵物。

sentences.english: Golden eagles use air currents to soar and may glide up to 15 miles at a stretch.
sentences.chinese: 鷲使用氣流來滑翔，並且一次能滑翔15英里。

sentences.english: " Elegy of a Hero": What fate awaits this captured gray-faced buzzard eagle?
sentences.chinese: 被捕的灰面鷲會有什麼遭遇？
